title: dataset
description: nature, shape, number of items, ownership and other properties (except data itself) of a dataset involved in a computing task

data_type.description: the nature of the data, example : tabular, audio, image, video, object

fileType.description: the file type of the dataset, example: ai, avi, csv, svg...

volumeUnit.description: the unit of the size of the dataset, example: kilobyte, megabyte...

source.description: the kind of source of the dataset, example: public, private...

sourceUri.description: the URI of the dataset if available

owner.description: the owner of the dataset if available

items.description: the number of items in the dataset

shape.description: the shape of each dataset item (for instance, an array of size 3, for greyscale images)
